owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment:
Vocablary used by the Explanation tool in PLEAD
A visualised Image of Vocablary ![Plead](Plead.png)

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A positive resolution reached after consideration.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Acceptance Decision

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
The type of process done to reach resolution reached after consideration.
This class is subclass to **prov:** [prov:Activity](http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#Activity)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Activity Type

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: make changes to data in order to make it more accurate.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Amending Data

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A resolution reached after an automated consideration.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Automated Decision

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
The data holded on data subject by the current organisation.
This class is subclass to **prov:** [prov:Entity](http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#Entity)
This class is equivalent to **gdpr:** [Data](https://w3id.org/GDPRtEXT#Data)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Data

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
The type of processes that can by done on data.
This class is subclass to **prov:** [prov:Activity](http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#Activity)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Data Activity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
The organisation that controls personal data.
This class is subclass to **prov:** [prov:Organization](http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#Organization)
This class is equivalent to **gdpr:** [Controller](https://w3id.org/GDPRtEXT#Controller)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Data Controller

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The request to remove data.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Data Erasure Request

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The request to citing a reason against procedure
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Data Objection Request

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The request to putting something right.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Data Rectify Request

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The request of restricting the data acesss
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Data Restrict Request

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The request to assessing a procedure formally with the intention of instituting change if necessary.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Data Review Request

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
The data subject is the person with data at the current organisation.
This class is subclass to **prov:** [prov:Agent](http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#Agent)
This class is equivalent to **gdpr:** [DataSubject](https://w3id.org/GDPRtEXT#DataSubject)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Data Subject

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
The type of process done to reach resolution reached after consideration.
This class is subclass to **prov:** [prov:Entity](http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#Entity)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Decision

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
A resolution reached after consideration.
This class is subclass to **prov:** [prov:Entity](http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#Entity)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Decision Result

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
The process of removing data attributes.
This class is equivalent to **gdpr:** [EraseData](https://w3id.org/GDPRtEXT#EraseData)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Erasing

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Data belonging to a DataSubject and under the control of the DataController.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: External Data

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A resolution reached after a human consideration.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Human Decision

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An activity that is done by intervention of human.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Human Led Activity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
An activity that is done using an automated process.
This class is equivalent to **gdpr:** [AutomatedProcessing](https://w3id.org/GDPRtEXT#AutomatedProcessing)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Machine Led Activity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Citing a reason against procedure.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Objecting

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
Document that tells you what to expect us to do with your personal information when you make contact with us or use one of our services.
This class is subclass to **prov:** [prov:Entity](http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#Entity)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Privacy Notice

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Dealing with data/request using an official procedure.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Processing

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
The process of update/fix data attributes.
This class is equivalent to **gdpr:** [RectifyData](https://w3id.org/GDPRtEXT#RectifyData)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rectifying

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A negative resolution reached after consideration.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rejection Decision

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
A request for process on the data.
This class is subclass to **prov:** [prov:Entity](http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#Entity)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Requests

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The process of restricting the data acesss.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Restricting

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
The amount of time the continued possession of the document.
This class is subclass to **prov:** [prov:Entity](http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#Entity)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Retention Period

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Assessing a procedure formally with the intention of instituting change if necessary.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Reviewing

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Data provided to a DataController from a third party (that is not the Data Subject)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Subject Data
